articles.author: Nova M Bajamonti
articles.title: Who is America's Got Talent star Putri Ariani? 17-year-old blind singer is huge in Indonesia - Daily Mail
articles.description: She may have recently found new fame on America's Got Talent, but 17-year-old Putri Ariani already has a successful musical career in her native Indonesia.
articles.content:
She may have recently found new fame on America's Got Talent, but 17-year-old Putri Ariani already has a successful musical career in her native Indonesia.
